name: sentinel
description: Structured decision protocol. Forces the questions you would skip, the perspectives you would miss, and the math you would approximate. Based on Kahneman (MAP), Klein (pre-mortem), Tetlock (calibration).

core-decision.description: Base decision hygiene skill — triage, noise audit, calibration scripts. Pre-loaded every session.

domain-hygiene.description: Domain-specific decision hygiene overlays — hiring, M&A, product, retrospective, strategy/marketing.
